sentences.en: 'I'm Ben Gunn, I am,'replied the maroon, wriggling like an eel in his embarrassment.
sentences.cn: “ 是的, 我是本-刚恩, ”这位放逐在荒滩上的水手答道, 一面不好意思地像鳗鱼一样扭动着身子.

sentences.en: Chest, abdomen and miscellaneous side gray stripe maroon.
sentences.cn: 胸部 、 腹部及体侧杂有灰栗色斑纹.

sentences.en: I wore a maroon velvet trouser suit that my daughter chose, and most of the village came to the reception.
sentences.cn: 那天，我穿了女儿为我挑选的栗色天鹅绒裤装，村庄里的大多数人都应邀参加了我的婚礼。

sentences.en: Medium - dark green, heart - shaped, quilted, glossy maroon back. Large.
sentences.cn: 中到深绿色叶, 心形状的叶, 叶脉鼓起, 叶面光滑,咖啡色的叶背. 大型.

sentences.en: No black or maroon color lip stick.
sentences.cn: 不可涂抹黑色或深褐色的口红.

sentences.en: Olive green, silver gray, purple and maroon.
sentences.cn: 橄榄绿 、 银灰 、 紫、暗红色.

sentences.en: On an impulse I grab a little maroon dress, pull Christiane from Frau Ballin's arms—she is still wearing only her undergarments—and quickly dress her in it.
sentences.cn: 慌乱中，我随手抓起一件栗色的连衣裙，给在巴林女士怀里的克丽丝汀换上，——可怜的克丽丝汀，她还穿着那件薄衬衣。

sentences.en: Pirates used to maroon people on desert islands.
sentences.cn: 海盗过去惯常把人们遗弃在荒岛.

sentences.en: The Mesabi Iron Range, a brutish stretch of maroon hillocks ( John McCormick ) See Synonyms at brute.
sentences.cn: 梅萨比艾恩山是褐紫红色山脉中艰险的一段 ( 约翰·麦考密克 ) 参见.

sentences.en: This pillow is maroon. It's a dark red.
sentences.cn: 这是一种接近紫色的暗红色.

sentences.en: When the tide came in I was a maroon out there.
You have the volume volume short hair, under the setting sun maroon quiet are and tasteful.
sentences.cn: 你有著卷卷的短发, 夕阳下的栗色沉静幽雅.

sentences.en: You have the volume volume short hair, under the setting sun maroon quiet are tasteful.
sentences.cn: 你有着卷卷的短发, 夕阳下的栗色沉静幽雅.

words.tran_cn: 栗色；逃亡黑人奴隶；孤立的人

trans.tran_cn: 逃亡黑奴，孤立的人，酱紫色，褐红色
把…放逐到孤岛，（因洪水等）使孤立，闲荡
